title: Surreptitious
description: Taylor Corsi, the girl who controls everything. The air she breathes, the life she leads and everyone who is involved with her, except....The guy who has it all. The house, the car, the money, the brothers, the life. No one knows the true Jackson Brent. Everyone has an opinion, he lets them. Gorgeous, charismatic, secretive, egotistical and damn proud of it. Jackson is everything Taylor can’t stand, but she is everything he wants. She’s his new challenge, he’s determined to have her and he never loses. Does he?How long can the game go on before it’s just not fun anymore?
author: D. Breeze
